attr.name: cite
attr.description: This attribute defines the URI of a resource that explains the change, such as a link to meeting minutes or a ticket in a troubleshooting sytem.

attr.name: datetime
attr.description: This attribute indicates the time and date of the change and must be a valid date with an optional time string. If the value cannot be parsed as a date with an optional time string, the element does not have an associated time stamp.

omission: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.
parents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.
